ComicInfo.Title: Fear No Art (Unless It's Out to Get You!)
ComicInfo.Summary: Fear No Art (Unless It's Out to Get You!): Arthur drags The Tick to a museum where the big blue one tries to fight off a heavy case of boredom but finally gets some action when The Impressionist attempts to make off with the newest piece of art on display, the Venus de Mayo (a jar of mayonnaise with a tiny statue inside).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 12:39:22. [CVDB121559] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 02:26:04. [Issue ID 265672]
ComicInfo.Characters: Klaw (cameo) (all three are winged lawyers),Dr. Bowlingame (guest),The Impressionist (villain),Arthur (guest),Tuthe (cameo),The Tick (feature),Knale (cameo),The Stinkin' Foot of Fate (guest)
